name: Senior Program
description: Weekly programming focused on improving quality of life and making healthy lifestyle choices through food distribution, health and wellness workshops, and recreational activities for individuals in the senior and aging community.
fullDescription: Weekly programming focused on improving quality of life and making healthy lifestyle choices through food distribution, health and wellness workshops, and recreational activities for individuals in the senior and aging community.
whatTheyOffer: Weekly programming focused on improving quality of life and making healthy lifestyle choices through food distribution, health and wellness workshops, and recreational activities for individuals in the senior and aging community.
howToGetIt: call or email for more information.
agency: West Bay Pilipino Multi Service Center
